eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 11:24 AM ON OCT 23, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 07:25 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Tucson Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Tucson Police Department is looking for John Williams, last seen driving a blue/gray Nissan, Juke with Arizona Plate ZHA0SY. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
